titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the exclusion from gross income for veterans' benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/23/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any benefit administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. (Current law excludes from gross income only qualified military benefits.)
